references.paper_title: Learning a deep convolutional network for image super-resolution
references.reason: This paper is foundational for deep learning-based super-resolution methods and is frequently cited in the field.

references.paper_title: Photo-realistic single image super-resolution using a generative adversarial network
references.reason: This paper introduced the use of GANs for image super-resolution, significantly advancing the quality and realism of generated images.

references.paper_title: Enhanced deep residual networks for single image super-resolution
references.reason: This paper proposed significant improvements to deep residual networks for super-resolution, achieving state-of-the-art results at the time.

references.paper_title: SwinIR: Image restoration using Swin Transformer
references.reason: This paper introduced the use of Swin Transformers for image restoration tasks, significantly improving performance and efficiency.

references.paper_title: Toward accurate post-training quantization for image super-resolution
references.reason: This paper is a direct competitor to the current work and provides a strong baseline for post-training quantization methods in super-resolution.
